desc.desc: Solution mainly for business customers to manage, plan and generate profit from their charging infrastructure for electric vehicles. Frontend (web app built with Angular + Android/iOS mobile apps) + backend (huge microservice matrix) together formed large, but robust platform, that stayed behind the numerous hardware in field. I helped develop systems that:

I have basic knowledge of Pivotal Cloud Foundry (run/stop/restart apps).

Used on project - eMobility.

Documentation/design tool for RESTful APIs - I have basic knowledge of this, because I checked Swagger pages for our services everyday as backend tester.

Used on project - eMobility.

Application Lifecycle Management - it basically served testers as storage and runner for the tests. However, it lacks connection to JIRA, so connecting tests to story tickets is tricky. On the other hand, UFT (test automation creation tool that we used) is directly integrated into ALM.

Used on project - eMobility.

Elasticsearch tool for app logs analysis.

Used on project - eMobility.

Each app within the microservice matrix had own DB, so it was necessary to learn to write SQL queries.

Used on project - eMobility.

Postman or similar tool is must for backend tester. You can easily store and create custom enviroments from interfaces, you can have different collections of variables used in requests (with different scope). I usually make use of it while performing manual tests. Postman is also capable of automation and chaining requestes with JS (using Mocha or Chai assertions).

Used on project - eMobility.

Unified Functional Testing is tool providing GUI and API testing module. GUI module was used mainly for long E2E tests, where we were including not only frontend parts (Angular web app), but also for ex. SAP, direct database queries and REST API calls. API module is great for functional testing, when testing in pure backend team focused on creating REST interfaces - it is low code platform with option to extend functionalities with C#.

Used on project - eMobility.

Issue tracking tool for software developement projects.

Used on project - eMobility.
